channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - December 17, 2021
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-december-17-2021) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _13th Age_ * _Against the Sith Conspiracy_ * _AKA_ * _Blades in the Dark_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Hit the Sith - Save the Galaxy_ * _Night's Black Agents Solo Ops_ * _Plutonian Shards_ * _Sleepaway_ * _Spectre Scouts_ * _Stars in the Dark_ * _Thirsty Sword Lesbians/CosmoKnights_ * _Trouble for Hire_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - December 17, 2021

item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:
